MON‚ÄìFRI, 4PM‚Äì8PM: $2 off drafts, $4 wells, $5 John Dalys, 50% off wine, $1 wings, and $5 cheese pizza ‚Ä¢ DUCKPIN It‚Äôs like regular bowling, but with smaller balls and bigger bragging rights. Perfect for those who think size doesn‚Äôt matter‚Äîuntil you miss that spare by an inch. Come for the strikes, stay for the laughs, and leave your ego at the door! Roll With It Go GAMES We‚Äôve got all kinds of wild ways to unleash your inner badass! Channel your inner lumberjack with our axe-throwing (no flannel required), dominate the high scores on our vintage arcade and pinball machines, or kick back with a drink and go big with our oversized yard games like giant pong. Trust us, boredom doesn‚Äôt stand a chance here! Level Up Go Weekly Specials + Promotions BOOKING FAQs Can I rent the entire venue? Yes!! When you opt for a venue buyout, you gain complete control over the space. A venue buyout allows you to customize every aspect of your event. From decor and layout to catering and entertainment, the possibilities are endless. Our dedicated event specialists will work closely with you from start to finish guiding you through the planning process and ensuring that every detail is executed flawlessly. With our expertise and attention to detail, you can relax and enjoy your event knowing that everything is taken care of. Can I bring outside food/drinks to MIX? No, we have a full-service restaurant here at MIX. We want this to be your new favorite hangout spot. We have a ton of huge TVs with all the popular games on, a variety of food options, and great beer/liquor selections. There will most definitely be something for everyone. If you‚Äôd like to have a special cake at your party or celebration, please contact us directly. Do you have private event space? Heck yeah! We have a Big Lebowski-Themed speakeasy that can handle up to 40 guests and comes with a private bar. You can also rent specific spaces within the venue. Where is MIX Located? You can find us at 730 Coleman Boulevard in Mt Pleasant, SC. Just 10 minutes from Downtown Charleston, 3 minutes from Shem Creek and 5 minutes from Sullivan‚Äôs Island. What games and experiences can I enjoy at Mix? We have a range of activities, including Duckpin Bowling, Pinball, new and Retro Arcade games, Axe Throwing. Foosball, Ping Pong, Patio Pong, and more. Do you have any age restrictions? Our venue is open to all ages, but we may, at times, require the kiddos to be escorted by an adult. Please check our social media pages for updates. Please note that our axe throwing is for guests 18 and older and all participants must have a waiver signed. Do you take lane reservations? Yes, please complete our events request form and our Event Sales Team will contact you. BOOKING FAQs Can I rent the entire venue? Yes!! Welcome to the only place where you can munch on epic food, sip on dangerously good cocktails, and still have a hand free to dominate the arcade, nail that bullseye, or crush a duckpin strike. Our menu is like a high score for your taste buds, and our drinks are the secret power-up you need to keep the fun going all night. Whether you‚Äôre recharging after some yard games on the patio or fueling up for an Guitar Hero showdown, our menu‚Äôs got the delicious edge to match the vibe.
